page.title: 08Buckdens Churches
page.content: There are three churches in Buckden. The Methodist,Parish and the Catholic Church { {St. Mary's Parish Church} St.Mary's has the largest congregation of all the churches. Reverend Francis, the vicar holds two services a day, six days a week. One Sunday a month he holds a special family service and on another Sunday a church parade for the scouts. In the afternoon he carries out his pastoral care work in the village. He also has weddings and christenings to organise as well as Parochial Church Council meetings to attend. {Catholic Church of St.Hugh The church is in the grounds of the Towers and draws its congregation from a wide area. As well as weekly services there youth groups connected to the church.
